page.title: 10THE QUEEN'S REGIMENT(CONT)
page.content: Cooks from the catering corps are also expected to shoot and pass infantry tests but are mainly involved in providing meals to fit in with soldiers' shifts. According to the training sergeant the most important aspect of training is the teaching of tactical awareness, fitness and shooting. Apart from running, some soldiers participate in martial arts.During training live ammunition is used but every precaution is taken for the soldiers's safety. During the Falkland's Crisis non-combattant soldiers took part in additional survival training in case they were needed. Recently the Regiment took part in Operation Lionheart, a NATO military exercice.Further training has taken place in Cyprus, Canada and Belize.The next posting is to Northern Ireland.
